thread.title: Chelsea Talks Fake News on Twitter… Instantly Learns What a Horrible Idea It Was
thread.title_full: Chelsea Talks Fake News on Twitter… Instantly Learns What a Horrible Idea It Was

author: Ben Marquis
title: Chelsea Talks Fake News on Twitter… Instantly Learns What a Horrible Idea It Was
text:
Dem Sen. “Forgets” Vote on Gorsuch, So Anchor Drags Out Congressional Record and Humiliates Him 
Then the hits just started rolling in, with reminder after reminder that the Clintons have their own history of making up stories about attacks that never happened, some taking the humorous route, others gently explaining how she was wrong, and a few simply getting directly to the point, of course with a dash of sarcasm. There's a joke around Bosnia and sniper fire to be written here somewhere… #BowlingGreen https://t.co/qPAx8uft0k 
— Joe Concha (@JoeConchaTV) February 3, 2017 As we all know, lying about acts of violence like, say, coming under sniper fire in Bosnia, is a very dishonest and bad thing to do. https://t.co/aVYPFNQqol 
— T. Becket Adams (@BecketAdams) February 3, 2017 Your mom lied about coming under sniper fire in Bosnia. https://t.co/mLvrq3ASH4 
— Chuck Ross (@ChuckRossDC) February 3, 2017 Glad your mom survived the gunfire in Bosnia. https://t.co/pJzOqUZOjH 
— Tim Carney (@TPCarney) February 3, 2017 
And for certain there were references to Benghazi. Just happy her mom survived the shooting in Bosnia, sorry we lost a US Ambassador under her during a made up protest over a movie. https://t.co/3DiBeCO2FM 
— Rich Kelsey (@RichKelsey) February 3, 2017 . @ChelseaClinton True. Let me ask Chris, Glen, Tyrone & Sean how they feel about made up attacks & lies. 
— The Media Lies (@MeganSmiles) February 3, 2017 
With literally tens of thousands of responses to Clinton’s tweet, there were a plethora of hilarious and highly snarky replies, but you get the general idea. 
One would think that the Clintons would still be keeping a low profile after the embarrassing shellacking they received in November, but alas, some people simply can’t resist the urge to poke their head up and fire off a tweet shot at someone from time to time. 
Oh wait, isn’t that something the left constantly criticizes the president for doing? 
H/T Right Scoop 
Please share this on Facebook and Twitter so that everyone can see how social media treated Chelsea Clinton for firing off a tweet without thinking through the ramifications of what she wrote. What do you think of the way social media reminded Chelsea Clinton about her own mother's penchant to "make up attacks"? Scroll down to comment below! Advertisement Popular Right Now
